uvi.description:
smackfs: restrict bytes count in smk_set_cipso()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.276 by commit 5f9880403e6b71d56924748ba331daf836243fca. For more details please see the references link.
